record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 1506
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 1506 -- (House of Representatives - October 02, 2007)

[Page: H11129]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that my name be removed as a cosponsor of H.R. 1506.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from North Carolina?
